agal.name: DefaultShader3D
agal.vertexShader: // vc0-3 = world * view * projection matrix // va0.xyz = vertex position // va1.xy = texture coordinates m44 op, va0, vc0 mov v0, va1
agal.fragmentShader: // v0.xy = texture coordinates // fs0 = diffuse map tex ft0, v0, fs0 <2d,repeat,linear> mov oc, ft0
